text: Could someone write up a quick description of our open house next week? Would like to start posting in the appropriate places.
Also - would we like to Include contagious and Ushahidi on the open house?

I'll take a whack at it. Do we know who the panelist/speakers are? All I want to confirm is we'll have a unique mixture, not 3 tech types (not that there's anything wrong with tech types). LMK. Thanks

<@U02F90CRQ>: for the moment it's just an open house for PDX startup week (similar to design week - but not as blown out.  No speakers or anything planned. We'll have beer and (maybe) some Olympic Provisions? Need confirmation from Marce.
Gotcha. You guys send me some details and I'll wordsmith them. Thanks.
cool on food and OP for Monday
Having never read one of these write ups, I hope this is close to the mark:

We are a startup product design agency born at P.I.E here in PDX.  Many of our clients are startups, as are people we enjoy sharing office space with - Contagious, Ushahidi and more to come.  Stop by for snacks from Olympic Provisions, adult beverages and to swap stories about all things startup.
I dig. I would say we could probably lose the word "startup" in the first sentence since you cover it that we work with them in the next one.
I was gonna be a bit snarkier but I don't want to overplay that hand.
Perfect! Thanks <@U02F90CRQ> ! I'll get it up tomorrow on calagator and the like
In other events news - we have decided a date for our Smart Things/Intel/UCS Hardware Hack Day: May 16th. Venue is (tentatively) at Simple. Pre Party (tentatively) at Ebay
I will work with <@U027PV4AP> and <@U026AP8CM> to get up on the team cal etc.
SmartThings liked our Manifesto/Mission Statement. I told them we will brainstorm some names and logos over the next month as we seek sponsors MORE TO COME
